column4: Okay I did ln -s /usr/bin/azureus /opt/azureus/azureus  it said it created the symlink but its not there.

Ah, I've done away with sudo. Did a "sudo su", then "passwd root", now I just "su" .
? I'm a newbie here... Perhaps something with security is preventing you. Don't know
